mapper.insert: insert into post values(null, #{title}, #{contents}, now(), (select no from category where name = #{category}))
mapper.select: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no=#{categoryNo} and no = #{postNo}
